p: In callus induction from nodal segments, only 2,4-D had an effect on the callus fresh weight, with no gains observed in the 2,4-D + BA combination. The treatment with 0.25 mg/L 2,4-D had the best result for fresh weight of calli (2.0 g/callus; >1.800% fresh weight gain), when compared with the initial explant fresh weight ( Table 1).
